Noticeable non-auditory alert

For systems that present auditory, time-sensitive alerts, people may need the alerts to be in a format that they will notice immediately, such as flashing lights or insistent vibration.

Comment on this item

  • Reference: 4-5-k to use systems safely without hearing hazard warnings
